text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Trump doesn’t even like you, called you names publicly and you are still on his bandwagon.  Why?  We all know that trump has zero leadership skills and he is responsible for our growing coronavirus deaths as well as a sinking economy.  He doesn’t deserve a 2nd term.
